titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment or recess of the Senate from April 29, 1988 until May 9, 1988.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/28/1988--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment or recess of the Senate on April 29, 1988, until May 9, 1988.
